meta.title: Threads集客個別相談会 | 無料オンライン相談
meta.description: Threads集客の個別相談会を開催中。あなたのビジネスに合わせた最適な集客戦略をご提案します。

footer_scripts:
<script>
        // 1. スクロールFade-inアニメーション
        const observerOptions = {
            threshold: 0.1,
            rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
        };

        const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
            entries.forEach(entry => {
                if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                    entry.target.classList.add('visible');
                }
            });
        }, observerOptions);

        // Fade-in対象要素を監視
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            const fadeElements = document.querySelectorAll('.benefit-item, .reason-item, .student-card, .faq-item, .section-title');
            fadeElements.forEach(el => {
                el.classList.add('fade-in');
                observer.observe(el);
            });

            // 2. 数字のカウントアップアニメーション
            const numberCircles = document.querySelectorAll('.number-circle');
            let hasAnimated = false;

            const numberObserver = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
                entries.forEach(entry => {
                    if (entry.isIntersecting && !hasAnimated) {
                        hasAnimated = true;
                        animateNumbers();
                    }
                });
            }, { threshold: 0.5 });

            if (numberCircles.length > 0) {
                numberObserver.observe(numberCircles[0].parentElement);
            }

            function animateNumbers() {
                const targets = [
                    { element: numberCircles[0], target: 1600, suffix: '' },
                    { element: numberCircles[1], target: 113, suffix: '万' },
                    { element: numberCircles[2], target: 150, suffix: '' }
                ];

                targets.forEach(({ element, target, suffix }) => {
                    let current = 0;
                    const increment = target / 60;
                    const duration = 2000;
                    const stepTime = duration / 60;

                    const timer = setInterval(() => {
                        current += increment;
                        if (current >= target) {
                            current = target;
                            clearInterval(timer);
                        }
                        element.textContent = Math.floor(current).toLocaleString() + suffix;
                    }, stepTime);
                });
            }

            // 4. 軽いパララックス効果
            let ticking = false;
            window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
                if (!ticking) {
                    window.requestAnimationFrame(() => {
                        const scrolled = window.pageYOffset;
                        const parallaxElements = document.querySelectorAll('.parallax-decoration');
                        parallaxElements.forEach((el, index) => {
                            const speed = 0.3 + (index * 0.1);
                            el.style.transform = `translateY(${scrolled * speed}px)`;
                        });
                        ticking = false;
                    });
                    ticking = true;
                }
            });
        });
    </script>

    <script>
        // スティッキーCTAの表示制御
        (function() {
            const stickyCta = document.querySelector('.sticky-cta-container');
            const trigger = document.getElementById('benefits-trigger');
            
            if (!stickyCta || !trigger) return;
            
            // Intersection Observerで監視
            const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
                entries.forEach(entry => {
                    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                        stickyCta.style.display = 'block';
                    } else if (entry.boundingClientRect.top > 0) {
                        stickyCta.style.display = 'none';
                    }
                });
            }, {
                threshold: 0,
                rootMargin: '-50px 0px 0px 0px'
            });
            
            observer.observe(trigger);
        })();
    </script>
